name: Scarlet Woman
otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today, show them the YOU ARE token, then the Demon token.
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)
flavor: "You have shown me the secrets of the Council of the Purple Flame. We have lain together in fire and in lust and in beastly commune, and I am forever your servant. But tonight, my dear, I am your master."

jinxes.reason: If the Storyteller would gain the Scarlet Woman ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman remains the Scarlet Woman.
If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman becomes the Scarlet Woman again.
If Lil' Monsta dies with 5 or more players alive, the Scarlet Woman babysits Lil' Monsta for the rest of the game.
